challenge.title: pattrice jones - Animals, Intersectionality, and "Rights" - Human Rights are Animal Rights
challenge.description: pattrice jones's Animals, Intersectionality, and "Rights" - Human Rights are Animal Rights is a lecture exploring intersectionality as an issue regarding rights, wherein rights are defined as animal rights, not just human rights.
challenge.instructions: Watch pattrice jones's Animals, Intersectionality, and "Rights" - Human Rights are Animal Rights on YouTube.
